creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: comic books depicting changes after foreigners entered Japan; pages of text with images; images of foreigners on first page; text on paper printed with yellow and green; images of street scene with Westerners in carriage, and various caricatures of Japanese people eating and drinking; blue cover with impressed flower pattern
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Collection of Humorous Leftovers (Kokkei zansai bukuro 滑稽残菜嚢), vol.
